metadata.title: 3D Glasses - Red/Cyan Plastic Frame
features: High quality and extreme comfort - For Anaglyph (red/cyan) movies such as: Shrek, Shark Boy & Lava Girl, Barbie & Pegasus, and other movies that use the red/cyan Anaglyph format
Can be used with field sequential movies, if you FIRST convert the movie to Anaglyph
The paper glasses that come with the Anaglyph movies are not as good as these. See sharper & clearer
3D Glasses must fit the 3D Format of the movie/game - these glasses only work with red/cyan or red/blue movies - Anaglyphic
There is no diopter correction in these glasses.
description: PLEASE NOTE: You just can't put on 3D glasses and expect to see 3D on your screen. The images on the screen must be in a 3D format. This format is Anaglyph. If you are not certain, you can give us a call or email us.
metadata.details: {"Product Dimensions": "6 x 2 x 0.9 inches", "Item Weight": "0.8 ounces", "Item model number": "3Dstereo Glasses", "Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Date First Available": "July 9, 2008", "Manufacturer": "3Dstereo Glasses"}
